name: Jukebox Beatdown
description:
Jukebox Beatdown is a new VR rhythm/boss-rush game that combines music videos and boss battles! You play as the Beat Brothers, two alien musicians trying to make their way to the top of the Billboard Galaxy Top 10. To make it to the top spot, they will need to battle 10 musicians, each of a different genre.

This project is still in development! If you have any feedback, please it send it to this form.

Each boss has a unique song and attack pattern. In the core gameplay loop, the player (the Beat Brothers) attack on the song’s rhythm while the boss attacks on the game’s melody.

This game is exclusively for the Oculus Rift or Quest (via Oculus Link). It does not work with the Vive or other headsets.

Check out the project's official page.

Check out the project's development blog.
